message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good chunk of money.
I understand you want a sizable share Alice, but so do I. This offer is much fairer for both of us in the long run.

Alice, this is getting silly. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution. Let's end this now and both walk away with something substantial.
